message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
